snippet: Weak economic reports bolstered investors who want the Fed to continue its bond-buying program, which has helped the markets rally since November.
abstract: Stocks rise as weak economic reports bolster investors who want the Fed to continue its bond-buying program.
lead_paragraph: Weak economic reports bolstered investors who want the Fed to continue its bond-buying program, which has helped the markets rally since November.

headline.main: Weak Reports Have a Silver Lining, and Shares Rise
headline.print_headline: Weak Reports Have a Silver Lining, and Shares Rise
